title: Plat MID/ADC LF Team (GER)
body:
Hey, my name is Philipp, I am 21 Years old and I am looking for a Ranked Team with players around plat/diamond to improve with. In Season 4 I was around Plat-Dia but dropped to Plat 1 just before the season ended. Now I am playing ranked again and on my best way to get high up. So if you are looking for a Duo partner, or a Midlaner or ADC for your ranked team, just add me ingame (Toray). I have alot of experience in serious and professional play, I can be shoutcaller and lead scrims and so on. i have experience in several different tournaments online and offline.
Looking forward to your pm!

Toray
